segments.text: It's heartbreaking to see the water ruining the kitchen floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman looks so content drying her plate, unaware of the flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that overflow is going to cause real damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron and dress might get soaked soon too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are in peril with that tipping stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so high up, reaching for those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move, and he'll tumble down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waits eagerly, but this could end in tears.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish the mother would turn around and save the day.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside seems idyllic, contrasting this sad scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like a picture of innocence about to shatter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Poor kids, getting into trouble without guidance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This makes me feel down about family moments gone wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR
